title: Ya'll gotta stop whining about the PBE changes

replies.body: Yeah, Im not a long term player but i have played for the last year and I don't hate on this patch. Haven't seen anything horrible or bad changes! Except its harder to jg now! Changing up the adcs i don't mind people just need to find who counters who and stuff

They actually made the jungle easier this patch man. Just make sure you're taking all the correct Masteries and Runes! Get all the jungle masteries and make sure you take flat armour yellows and remember jungle monsters dont have MR!
It's not as bad as people say. If you study up you'll find the new OP picks and strategies. I think the main issue is people are trying to hold on to old mains and expecting to do as well.
It's honestly not bad at all and I so far haven't seen any champions who were gutted to the point of unvaibility
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}} THANK YOU holy shit the crying and bitching was doing my head in, finally good to see a positive post about the patch!
I agree. I actually really like this patch it just needs a couple balances (A fair bit) and bugfixes here and there.
Im guessing the champs you use either don't require mana, or are ADC's?

Lol

I have played ADC literally no more than like 4 times this season in Ranked. It is my absolute worst role and I fucking hate it.

Literally every single champ I play OFTEN, requires mana.... In fact I think the only champion I play at all that does not require mana is Zed

This patch is so good
dont know if we got the same patch but the one i got sucks ass and ruined the game
Enlighten me. What sucks about it so much?
